description: This NPP is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/G and covers a requirement from the following product sub-category: Rotary chairs and stools. Canada Economic Development for Quebec Regions has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office seating to 800 René-Lévesque West Blvd, Montreal (Québec) H3B 1X9 by March 31st, 2023. The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). There is a security requirement associated with the requirement. For additional information, consult the bid solicitation document.

full_summary:
## Rotary Chairs and Stools RFP - Government of Canada
### Notice Details

* **Title**: Rotary Chairs and Stools
* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01023865
* **Publication Date**: January 30, 2023
* **Closing Date**: February 9, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Contracting Entity**: Economic Development Agency of Canada for the Regions of Quebec
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering

### Necessity Description

The Economic Development Agency of Canada for the Regions of Quebec has a requirement to purchase, deliver, and install office seating for 800 René-Lévesque West Blvd, Montréal (Québec) H3B 1X9 by March 31st, 2023. The office seating requirement falls under the Product Subcategory 1 - Rotary Chairs and Stools.

### Mandatory Documents

The notice includes various attachments:

* RFP # 9K001-S23-0128 Amendment 1
* RFP # 9K001-S23-0128 Amendment 2
* RFP # 9K001-S23-0128
* NPP - Rotary Chairs - CED

### Eligibility Requirements

Only suppliers that are pre-qualified and have an active Supply Arrangement (SA) are eligible to bid on this requirement. Suppliers not holding an SA may still submit a bid but must also submit an arrangement for evaluation. 

### Closing Conditions

Canada is not required to delay the award of a resulting contract pending the evaluation of an arrangement and issuance of a SA by the PWGSC Supply Arrangement Authority.

### Contact Information

Information inquiries should be addressed to Cecilia Phuong Thu Ho, Contracting Authority:

* Email: [cecilia-phuong-thu.ho@dec-ced.gc.ca](mailto:cecilia-phuong-thu.ho@dec-ced.gc.ca)
* Phone: 514-346-8484 

Note. RCNAmeublement.NCRFurniture@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca should be contacted for inquiries on becoming a pre-qualified SA holder.

### Business Confirmation

Confirmation of your submitted bid should be addressed to the contracting authority, in accordance with the bid solicitation document. If you wish to find out how you can be a pre-qualified SA holder, please contact RCNAmeublement.NCRFurniture@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
